summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; making an additional appropriation from the Arterial City Street Fund for the City's share of costs for right of way activities, including purchase, and the construction of the widening of Holman Road N.W. between Greenwood Ave. N. and 15th Ave. N.W.; authorizing the execution of agreements with the Washington State Urban Arterial Board for Financial Assistance therefor; authorizing the acceptance of said financial assistance; and authorizing the hiring of consultants and the awarding of contracts.
